channel.title: Tech on Alex Toombs
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Alex Toombs

item.title: Wfh Desk Setup
item.description: Is there any office outside the home anymore? Back in the halcyon days of March 2020, the first WFH orders came down and I thought to myself “okay, I’d better get some stuff to make this setup a little more bearable”. At the time I was working at Alto Pharmacy, and my desk setup was pretty nice in the office; I had two monitors, keyboard, and a mouse at home to use with my personal desktop, but I was tired of fumbling cables at the beginning and end of every work day.
